data.name: Acid Distillation
data.description: Increase Villagers' gathering rate for Gold by 15%.

data.name: Acid Distillation (Improved)
data.description:
Increase Villagers' gathering rate for Gold by 22.5%.
If Acid Distillation has already been researched, increase it by 7.5% instead.

data.name: Professional Scouts
data.description:
Scouts gain the ability to carry animal carcasses and +100% damage against wild animals.
Scouts move -35% slower while carrying and cannot pick up Boar.

data.name: Professional Scouts (Improved)
data.description:
Scouts gain the ability to carry animal carcasses and +200% damage against wild animals. Scouts move -100% slower while carrying a carcass and cannot pick up Boar.
If Professional Scouts has already been researched, increase damage by +35% instead.

data.name: Yam Network
data.description: Yam speed aura applies to all units instead of just Traders and cavalry units. Does not apply to siege engines.

data.name: Yam Network (Improved)
data.description:
Yam speed aura applies to all units instead of just Traders and cavalry units. Does not apply to siege engines.
Improved Yam Network allows Traders to regenerate 1 health every 2 seconds while in Yam's aura.
